reviewText: very disappointed. We bought the dvd to help our son learn portuguese at school. The video took weeks to arrive. The dvd skips and has no subtitles. The english subtitles are the main reason we purchased the dvd. very disappointed...
Such a fun cartoon. It's entertaining and full of laughs. Picked it up for my wife and she tells me just how much it brings back her childhood. The DVD is in Portuguese (Brazilian).
